authors.author: J. Wilbur Chapman Rowland H. Prichard

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Hallelujah what a Savior. newline Hallelujah what a Friend. newline Saving, helping, keeping, loving, newline He is with me to the end.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus! What a friend for sinners! newline Jesus lover of my soul! newline Friends may fail me, foes assail me; newline He, my Savior, makes me whole.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus! What a strength in weakness! newline Let me hide myself in Him; newline Tempted tried and sometimes failing, newline He, my strength my victory wins.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus! What a help in sorrow! newline While the billows o'er me roll, newline Even when my heart is breaking, newline He, my Comfort helps my soul.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Jesus! What a guide and keeper! newline While the tempest still is high, newline Storms about me, night o'ertakes me, newline He, my pilot hears my cry.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Jesus! I do now receive Him; newline More than all in Him I find. newline He hath granted me forgiveness; newline I am His and He is mine.
